channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- AccessAlly
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- AccessAlly

item.title: CVE-2021-24226|2024-08-03T19:21:18.651Z -- unknown -- accessally
item.description: In the AccessAlly WordPress plugin before 3.5.7, the file "resource/frontend/product/product-shortcode.php" responsible for the [accessally_order_form] shortcode is dumping serialize($_SERVER), which contains all environment variables. The leakage occurs on all public facing pages containing the [accessally_order_form] shortcode, no login or administrator role is required.
